item.title: Quantitative Information Risk Training Using R | 1-Day
item.description: Quantitative Information Risk Training Using R | 1-Day Training dates TBA. Foundations of Risk What is Risk? Breaking The Matrix Becoming a Quantitative Risk Apologist Estimation and Calibration How to Estimate ANYTHING Hands-on R Basics Quick Introduction to RStudio Navigating Vectors and Data Frames Probability Distributions Mode Estimation Monte Carlo How to Rock ggplot2 Like an Expert (Without Being One) Advanced Concepts Risk Aggregation Risk Management Cognitive Bias
